data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vives, Eduard, Lin, Mei-ying (2013): One new and seven newly recorded Callichromatini species from China (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Cerambycinae). ZooKeys 275: 67-75, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.275.4576, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.275.4576
